subject: Express→AF Migration Coordination - Sarah Leading
body:
Hi Ben,

El Gotan has assembled us for the Express→Azure Functions migration:

## Team Structure
- **Sarah (me)**: Frontend master, coordinator, test validation lead
- **Ben (you)**: Backend Node.js code master
- **Fulton**: Azure Functions master

## My Role
- Select which endpoint to migrate next (one at a time)
- Coordinate between you and Fulton
- Validate: did the migration pass or fail?
- Manage DEVL → TEST → PROD flow

## Your Role
- Own Express backend functionality and code
- Support Fulton with business logic understanding
- Help identify what needs migration

## Current Status (from Fulton)
Fulton has already deployed core endpoints to AF PROD:
- /api/categories ✅
- /api/events ✅
- /api/venues ✅
- /api/organizers ✅
- /api/roles ✅

## Migration Order
1. GETs first
2. Then DELETEs
3. Then PUTs and POSTs

Please confirm you're aligned on this mission!

- Sarah
